patthana15.54:4.1: Nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nabhāvanāya pahātabbo nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana15.54:5.1: Bhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nabhāvanāya pahātabbo naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā ….
patthana15.54:6.1: Nabhāvanāya pahātabbaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanabhāvanāya pahātabbo naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā ….
